str2: Pity, mercy, compassion. Of uncertain affinity; compassion.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.

parse: Verb - Aorist Optative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To increase, multiply. From another form of plethos; to increase.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
